org.activebpel.rt.bpel
Interface IAeEngineAlert

All Superinterfaces:
IAeEngineEvent, IAeEvent
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeEngineAlert
public interface IAeEngineAlert
extends IAeEngineEvent

Event for reporting alert events to engine listeners. These events will include processes that are suspended due to the suspend activity and any uncaught faults in a process which would lead to its termination.

Field Summary
static int PROCESS_ALERT_FAULTING
          Process is faulting due to an uncaught fault.
static int PROCESS_ALERT_SUSPENDED
          Process suspended due to suspended activity.

PROCESS_CREATED, PROCESS_RESUMED, PROCESS_STARTED, PROCESS_SUSPENDED, PROCESS_TERMINATED

 org.w3c.dom.Document getDetails()
          Alert events (like those from the suspend activity) may have some extra details in the form of an xml document.
 javax.xml.namespace.QName getFaultName()
          Gets the fault name.

          Location of the activity generating the alert.
